articles.description: I haven’t watched Sandeep Reddy Vanga’s Animal and I don’t intend to. So this is not a review of his film, but a review of the way he has attacked film critics for not liking his film.
articles.content: Film criticism reflects a society's relationship with its arts and with censorship. Many kinds of cinema and its critics have ended up playing mouthpieces to the State and its rule that is markedly v… [+1437 chars]
